General.Name: Changzhou Architectural Research Institute Group Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Changzhou Architectural Research Institute Group Co.,Ltd provides inspection and testing services in the field of construction projects and environmental protection in China and internationally. It offers detection and identification services, such as engineering quality inspection, professional non-destructive testing, traffic inspection, and environmental testing; special construction, foundation and foundation engineering, and building maintenance services; and consulting and design services comprising geotechnical engineering design and consultation, as well as green building technical and special technical plan consultation. The company also provides certified product services; anti-skid items for floor tiles and tiles in public areas; non-tapping repair methods for leaks in toilets and bathrooms; reflective and heat-insulating coatings for sun rooms and glass rooms; and waterproof materials for exterior walls. In addition, it offers green building materials consisting of concrete admixtures; building energy-saving insulation systems; high-speed rail new materials; dry powder mortar-ready-mixed mortars, mortar for new wall materials, special mortars, and colored mortars; functional materials; reinforcement, repair, home improvement, and other services; environment-friendly wear-resistant floor systems; concrete rigid self-waterproof systems; and GMT anti-scourrence mortars. Changzhou Architectural Research Institute Group Co.,Ltd was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Changzhou, China.
